CustomField.description: When checked the system will calculate billing details automatically. If entity is "Contact" the mailing address of the contact is used, otherwise the account's billing address is used. The contact on the invoice will populate the billing contact field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked the system will calculate billing details automatically. If entity is "Contact" the mailing address of the contact is used, otherwise the account's billing address is used. The contact on the invoice will populate the billing contact field.
CustomField.label: Calculate Billing Details
